argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_epweon | |- _E We On |
| 3 |  | #P_epse | |- _E Se On |
| 4 |  | #P_tfrALTlem | |- recs ( G ) = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqtri | |- F = wrecs ( _E , On , G ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_wfr2 | |- ( z e. On -> ( F ` z ) = ( G ` ( F |` Pred ( _E , On , z ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_predon | |- ( z e. On -> Pred ( _E , On , z ) = z ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( z e. On -> ( F |` Pred ( _E , On , z ) ) = ( F |` z ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( z e. On -> ( G ` ( F |` Pred ( _E , On , z ) ) ) = ( G ` ( F |` z ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( z e. On -> ( F ` z ) = ( G ` ( F |` z ) ) ) |
